entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 4 cm over the Riding Mountains. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
